meanings.sent1: She resews the button on her shirt.
meanings.sent2: After the thread broke, she resews it carefully.
meanings.sent3: He resews the torn seam with colorful thread.
meanings.sent4: The tailor resews the hem with precision.
meanings.sent5: Mom resews the torn teddy bear to make it whole again.

meanings.sent5: The seamstress resews the delicate lace dress for the bride.
